name: Most Addictive Geometry Endless Meltdown Difficult Escape
name_original: Most Addictive Geometry Endless Meltdown Difficult Escape
description:
Jump over and over again. It’s a all new complete tapping challenge. Cross the designed levels.Fly and flip your way through dangerous passages and spiky obstacles.

Walk through the clutter of geometry, challenge your limits!
Simple one touch game play that will keep you entertained for hours!Play Impossible Dash, Dash and Jump,enjoy it as much as you can!

Note - Gameplay is such like all you need to do is to tap to jump with perfect timing. Hold longer to jump higher

Game Features
• Rhythm-based Levels!
• Clean and colorful graphics
• Challenge yourself with the near impossible gameplay!
